name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Outlook 365 to Zoom Meetings, URL Cleaner

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For Windows & Outlook 365 users who get a ';' at the end of the meeting URL.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With a recent change to Outlook 365 the Location field in meetings will include a ";" character when copying & pasting the Zoom Meeting URL. 

If the ";" character is included when you try and join a meeting, you will be required to manually enter the Password for the meeting.

This extension is a simple tool to remove the ";" character from meeting URL's & allow seamless entry to the meeting if the included password is correct.
